text: Peter Francis Welch (born May 2, 1947) is an American politician and member of the Democratic Party. Welch is the junior U.S. Senator from Vermont since 2023. He was the U.S. Representative for Vermont's At-large congressional district from 2007 to 2023. In 2016, Welch supported U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders for the Democratic nomination for President. He supported him again in 2020. In November 2021, Welch announced his candidacy for the Democratic nomination for the United States Senate in the 2022 election to replace retiring Senator Patrick Leahy. He won the general election in November 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Peter Welch official U.S. House site * Peter Welch for Congress * * *Profile and interviews at Politico * Profile at SourceWatch Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Vermont Category:United States senators from Vermont Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century Roman Catholics
title: Peter Welch
